> You can try to write as this `mqadmin updateBrokerConfig -k messageDelayLevel -v '1s 5s 10s'

same result

> Can you describe your issue in more detail? I can not understand it.

是这样的。
原先这个mq cluster有两个broker，一主一从，broker-a, broker-a-1

我用 mqadmin updateBrokerConfig -bxxxxx -k brokerName -vbroker-a 修改了从节点 Broker的名称。

然后，我发现rocketmq-console的cluster页面上有三个broker，分别为broker-a,broker-a,broker-a-1，其中两个的broker addr是一样的。

我用arthas工具看了下RouteInfoManager#getAllClusterInfo的结果，发现clusterAddrTable变量mqcluster对应了三个broker

@Kanepan 
目前基本不报错了，我经过多次调整参数，观察对比，最终的调优方案，我做了个总结：[RocketMQ调优心得总结](https://blog.csdn.net/qq_27641935/article/details/106015319)
[RocketMQ调优心得总结](https://blog.csdn.net/qq_27641935/article/details/106015319)

RocketMQ 部署的机器是虚拟机，内存和IO性能不高的话，确实比较头疼，我们线上虚拟机，调优了很多次才稳定，调优路漫漫啊～～～
请参考：[RocketMQ调优心得总结](https://blog.csdn.net/qq_27641935/article/details/106015319)

> > Can you describe your issue in more detail? I can not understand it.
> 
> 是这样的。
> 原先这个mq cluster有两个broker，一主一从，broker-a, broker-a-1
> 
> 我用 mqadmin updateBrokerConfig -bxxxxx -k brokerName -vbroker-a 修改了从节点 Broker的名称。
> 
> 然后，我发现rocketmq-console的cluster页面上有三个broker，分别为broker-a,broker-a,broker-a-1，其中两个的broker addr是一样的。
> 
> 我用arthas工具看了下RouteInfoManager#getAllClusterInfo的结果，发现clusterAddrTable变量mqcluster对应了三个broker

确实存在这样的问题。更改brokerName之后，RouteInfoManager之前的brokerName信息并没有删除。欢迎提交PR来解决这个问题，比如可以通过ip:port来删除旧信息。
It is a repeated issue. I will close this issue first. Similar issues #1984 #1919 #1807.

On the first point, although the reputmessageservice is a single thread, there are still threads reading the indexfile concurrently, so the read-write lock is not unnecessary. As for the second point, I agree with you.
